explains: adj. 耐用的；重型的，重负荷的

sentences.en: I think you need some heavy-duty advice.
sentences.cn: 我想你需要一些有分量的意见。

sentences.en: As an additional safeguard against weeds you can always use an underlay of heavy duty polyethylene.
sentences.cn: 作为另外一种预防杂草的防护措施，你可以一直使用一层厚重耐磨的聚乙烯底垫。

sentences.en: The real heavy duty work of the translating process is " quality control ".
sentences.cn: 这一阶段真正繁重的工作是“ 质量控制 ”。
